channel.title: CVE Feed for Dassault Systèmes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dassault Systèmes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1288|2024-08-02T05:40:59.886Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- enovia%20live%20collaboration
item.description: An XML External Entity injection (XXE) vulnerability in ENOVIA Live Collaboration V6R2013xE allows an attacker to read local files on the server.

item.title: CVE-2023-1287|2024-08-02T05:41:00.015Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- enovia%20live%20collaboration
item.description: An XSL template vulnerability in ENOVIA Live Collaboration V6R2013xE allows Remote Code Execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-1847|2024-07-26T15:33:34.173Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- edrawings
item.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow, Memory Corruption, Out-Of-Bounds Read, Out-Of-Bounds Write, Stack-based Buffer Overflow, Type Confusion, Uninitialized Variable, Use-After-Free vulnerabilities exist in the file reading procedure in eDrawings from Release SOLIDWORKS 2023 through Release SOLIDWORKS 2024. These vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code while opening a specially crafted CATPART, IPT, JT, SAT, STL, STP, X_B or X_T file. NOTE: CVE-2024-3298 and CVE-2024-3299 were SPLIT from this ID.

item.title: CVE-2024-3298|2024-07-26T15:36:42.776Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- edrawings
item.description: Out-Of-Bounds Write and Type Confusion vulnerabilities exist in the file reading procedure in eDrawings from Release SOLIDWORKS 2023 through Release SOLIDWORKS 2024. These vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code while opening a specially crafted DWG or DXF. NOTE: this vulnerability was SPLIT from CVE-2024-1847.

item.title: CVE-2024-3299|2024-07-26T15:36:31.598Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- edrawings
item.description: Out-Of-Bounds Write, Use of Uninitialized Resource and Use-After-Free vulnerabilities exist in the file reading procedure in eDrawings from Release SOLIDWORKS 2023 through Release SOLIDWORKS 2024. These vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code while opening a specially crafted SLDDRW or SLDPRT file. NOTE: this vulnerability was SPLIT from CVE-2024-1847.

item.title: CVE-2024-3301|2024-05-30T15:18:14.217Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description: An unsafe .NET object deserialization vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2019 through Release 2024 could lead to post-authentication remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-3300|2024-06-04T17:33:17.300Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- delmia%20apriso
item.description: An unsafe .NET object deserialization vulnerability in DELMIA Apriso Release 2019 through Release 2024 could lead to pre-authentication remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-1847|2024-04-04T15:09:52.326Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- edrawings
item.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow, Memory Corruption, Out-Of-Bounds Read, Out-Of-Bounds Write, Stack-based Buffer Overflow, Type Confusion, Uninitialized Variable, Use-After-Free vulnerabilities exist in the file reading procedure in eDrawings from Release SOLIDWORKS 2023 through Release SOLIDWORKS 2024. These vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code while opening a specially crafted CATPART, IPT, JT, SAT, STL, STP, X_B or X_T file. NOTE: CVE-2024-3298 and CVE-2024-3299 were SPLIT from this ID.

item.title: CVE-2024-1848|2024-03-22T10:58:51.824Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- solidworks%20desktop
item.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow, Memory Corruption, Out-Of-Bounds Read, Out-Of-Bounds Write, Stack-based Buffer Overflow, Type Confusion, Uninitialized Variable, Use-After-Free vulnerabilities exist in the file reading procedure in SOLIDWORKS Desktop on Release SOLIDWORKS 2024. These vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code while opening a specially crafted CATPART, DWG, DXF, IPT, JT, SAT, SLDDRW, SLDPRT, STL, STP, X_B or X_T file.

item.title: CVE-2024-1624|2024-03-01T15:47:43.521Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- documentation%20server
item.description: An OS Command Injection vulnerability affecting documentation server on 3DEXPERIENCE from Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2022x through Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2024x, SIMULIA Abaqus from Release 2022 through Release 2024, SIMULIA Isight from Release 2022 through Release 2024 and CATIA Composer from Release R2023 through Release R2024. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-5597|2024-06-04T17:28:40.616Z -- dassault%20syst%C3%A8mes -- 3dswymer
item.description: A stored Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting 3DDashboard in 3DSwymer from Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2023x through Release 3DEXPERIENCE R2024x allows an attacker to execute arbitrary script code.
